text: (usake nazadeek) sab baraabar hain (aadamee kisee haalat mein ho magar) us akele ke lie usake aage usake peechhe usake nigehabaan (pharishte) muqarrar hain ki usako hukm khuda se hiphaazat karate hain jo (neamat) kisee qaum ko haasil ho beshak vah log khud apanee naphsaanee haalat mein tagyyur na daalen khuda haragiz tagyyur nahin daala karata aur jab khuda kisee qaum par buraee ka iraada karata hai to phir usaka koee taalane vaala nahin aur na usaka usake siva koee vaalee aur (saraparast) hai
